divs: Sighting Detailsi and three other observed a series of lights at which we counted 6, three were near 200 feet from us. they raides and lowered through the treeline for alomost an hour flashing. there was no noise and it seemed the animlas and even bugs went silent. this was all taking place in Volcano California in the middle of no where. this lasted for almost 2 hours before we decided it was best to go inside and stay inside. these lights would flas almost as if watching a lightbulb tungston light up in slow motion. the only way to best describe what i saw is it was like a shield on a ship from starwars turning on left too right. where the lights were loacted that night were above an open field with only cattle near. we tryed to take film but it could not be picked up on our cameras. this was strange because we were in pitch black and every flas was bright enough too see both my brother and friends faces clearly.
Summary: i and 2 others observed rising and lowering lights through treeline
trends: There has been one other sighting in volcano
There were no other sightings in volcano on or around May 14th 2013
